title: Help I'm married to a mafia boss!
description: Gabriella managed to live in her head, pretending her life was perfect until the day her father got taken away from her. The people who murdered him were not done with the job and managed to kidnap her making her think at that moment her life was over. When she gets saved by her father’s closest friend he gives her two options. Either she marries his son and forever live under the protection of his family or try to survive on her own. Not wanting her life to end she chooses option one. Now she can no longer pretend she doesn’t live in the world filled with blood and tears because she married the head of the most dangerous family alive.
author: Shafira Sardar
